circumstances: On approach to Goose Bay following a transatlantic flight from RAF Fairford, the aircraft was misaligned and crashed in a wooded and hilly terrain located 26 km southwest of the airport. Fifteen crew members were injured and two others (seated in the rear part of the cabin) were killed.
probable_cause: It was determined that the accident was the consequence of a misguiding on part of the GCA in Labrador.
